storyInfo: Bibeak returns home both to see her parents, and someone in prison who hurt her in the past.

attributes.content: Oh! What happened...?
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Are you okay, Bibeak?
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Gee, Bibeak, you're so excited to go home you can't even hold your cup?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Well, as they say in Yan: Break a cup, break a trouble. Sounds like everything's gonna be great!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. This is your send-off party. You sit right there, and I'll go get you a new cup.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Ah, watch out! Lemme clean this up first.
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Bibeak...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.text: We're both doing fine. No need to worry about us.
I've been keeping your room just the way you left it. Your dad has new glasses now. I guess he should've listened when you told him to take better care of his eyes!
We're happy to hear that you've been doing well on Rhodes Island, and are really proud of the work you're doing there.

There's something we've been hesitating to tell you, but decided in the end that it's better for you to know. The culprit who infected you with Oripathy has been caught, and he's now serving a prison sentence.
I hope this helps give you some closure, after all these years. Wishing you the best over at Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: (...He's been jailed for a year now, and Mom and Dad didn't tell me until now.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (They didn't need to worry. I... I don't care anymore. Yeah.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (There's a photo of Mom and... my goodness, why are Dad's new glasses that color?)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (Mom definitely picked it on purpose.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (Are these clothes for me? And a new rapier... It looks nice and handles well. Must be Dad's work.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Looks like your folks sent you enough stuff to fill a small house.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: And I suppose you'll be using this sword in training later?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Yeah, Dad designed it for me.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: That's so sweet. I bet you were very close back home.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: N-No, not really...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Ooh, getting embarrassed?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: ...Keep that up and you're not getting that new skirt you wanted.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Ouch, now that's below the belt! What would I even wear without you making clothes for me?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Come on, stop teasing me.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Haha. Alright, I'll let you read your mail in peace.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Bibeak casts her gaze towards the other letter on the table.
The sender's name isn't written, only the address: 'Municipal Prison.'
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: 'Kind lady, I write this letter with gratitude in my heart. I feel that I have found peace in my soul, and would like to share this joy with you.'
'Plagued by guilt over harming an innocent soul with Originium, I sought help from a psychiatrist, who helped me deal with my issues.'
'He said that everyone should have the chance to forgive themselves for their mistakes. I gave myself such a chance, forgave my own mistake, and now I feel at peace.'
'I asked him how you might be feeling now. I believe you need to break free of the cycle of hatred and pain in order to find peace.'
'Please hear me out, kind lady. We must forgive ourselves and forgive others, put down our hatred, and even embrace our enemies, in order to move on to a new life.'
Why are you staring into space? Who was that letter from?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: It's him... the man who...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Who? Oh... what did he say?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: He said he found forgiveness and peace.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: That's... a good thing. Right?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I've been so busy these past few years that I'd almost completely forgotten about it. I don't really think about it anymore.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: The man said he... I don't know which psychiatrist he talked to, but he said he found peace in his heart, and no longer feels pain from hurting me.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I'm thinking... I've almost forgotten about it. He's in prison, but he let things go too, in his own way.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: So once he's released, he should be able to start a new life, shouldn't he?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Hehe... that's good. Time to close the book on this. I...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: A tear flows down the corner of Bibeak's eye.
Tears begin to flow uncontrollably, as though a dam had burst inside her eyes.
She feels as anxious as she is confused.
She tries to wipe her tears with her hand, but the gesture is futile as even more take their place. She begins to cry uncontrollably.
Bibeak?! What's going on? Are you okay?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: W-What's happened to me?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Come on, here's a handkerchief!
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I... I don't know what's wrong with me...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I must be overcome with joy about getting to visit home...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: S-Sorry...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: It's okay, it's okay. Go wash your face. I'll get you a cup of warm water.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Come on, go!
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: O-Okay!
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: What happened to me?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Did you ask, Bibeak?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Yes, I'll be getting off when Rhodes Island stops to resupply in Columbia next month. Amiya gave me two months off.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I'll be spending that time with my parents, maybe going on a trip with them. But I'm thinking about what to bring them.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Souvenirs from other countries? Perhaps something from Rhodes Island? Or something I made myself?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Should I have it sent by Messenger? Or bring it in person?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Hey, don't get yourself in a twist over this. There's still plenty of time to prepare.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Whoa! Your hands are ice-cold! What's the matter?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I'm just nervous.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: After that letter last week, I've been thinking... I think I'll visit the prison, see that man.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: ...Bibeak.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I admire you for making such a decision.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: It... took me a week to make up my mind.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I just felt like I needed to go and take a look. After, it's my... my...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: It'll be okay. It's a way to come to terms with the past. You're very brave for doing it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Let's go. And maybe we can ask some other people about what souvenirs to bring home.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Lily? Sorry for bothering you. I'm going home next month and wanted some advice on what would make a good souvenir.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Drunk Fins from Yan? Okay... thanks. I'll think about it.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: You brought cookies you learned how to make from Gummy? That sounds fun. I'll go and ask in the kitchen. Thank you!
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Oh, Gummy is out on a field mission? I see...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Your family loved the mission photos you brought back? Hm, let me think...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Thanks, I think I have a better idea now.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (It seems that families prefer gifts made by the operators themselves.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (Something personal, something filled with love...)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: A few days later
The new clothes are done already? Wowie, that was fast! I'm so glad you're my sewing teacher.
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: I just taught you some of the basics. I wouldn't say I'm your teacher exactly.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I... only just got to the point where I'm cutting the cloth right. Who knows how long it'll take me to start making clothes for Dad?
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: You're doing well for a beginner. Just keep it up, and you'll improve.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: So, after asking everyone what they took when they went home, you ended up making clothes for your parents.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, I asked people what they brought.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Their families preferred boxes of homemade cookies—even when they got crushed in transit—over Ursus honeyed mead or rare Sami smoked jerky.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I think it's because you put more of yourself in the things you make on your own.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: For example, I just realized that I didn't know my parents' sizes anymore, so I couldn't make anything too close-fitting. I ended up making them jackets.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Jackets are good. Warm and nice to look at. But you're not going back until next month, right? Do you really need to be pulling all-nighters?
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: I... just feel anxious when I'm not doing anything these days. I feel like I have to keep myself busy.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Probably because you're going home. Happens to everyone when they're excited.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Maybe... it's 'cause you're going to see the guy who hurt you. You sure that's a good idea?
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: I've always reckoned you should stay away from the bad guys.
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: I was a little concerned when I heard that too... What are you even going to say to him? What if it was a trick? What if he says something you don't want to hear?
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: It should be fine... I think?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: It's just a normal prison visit. There will be plenty of guards around, and we'll have a layer of glass between us.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I'm not going there to do anything in particular, just to see how he's doing in prison.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Considering he wrote that letter and talked to a psychiatrist there, I guess he wants to live better too.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: If he finds peace and gets a new start on life, good for him. That's what I think. Am I wrong?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: If I were you, I'd wear my best clothes and tell him I'm doing great. Show him that I'm not affected at all.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: But I'm not you, Bibeak. Do whatever you want.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Whatever I want...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Hey, whatcha girls up to? I heard the word 'clothes' from outside the door.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Lava's got a ton of cool outfits we could put you in! Maybe the one with the mask?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You're going to a prison, after all. Gotta assert dominance!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Ha.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Oh, come on, this is a serious conversation.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: But Bibeak just smiled, didn't she?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Thank you for trying to help.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (But... what are my own thoughts?)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Hey, why are you back at the drawing board?
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: (I'm designing clothes... for the prisoner...)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (If clothes represent emotions, what clothes would I design for him?)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (Dark? Warm? Broken? Comfortable? Stiff? Grotesque?)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (Why would I want to make clothes for him to begin with? What do these lines, this cloth, these threads mean?)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (I don't know...)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: She's so into it she can't hear a word we're saying...
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Bibeak?
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Bibeak does not answer. She continues drawing on the sheet.
Welp, guess it's time for me to take a nap.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I'm still a little worried... I hope Bibeak's parents don't let her go alone.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: But if her visit goes without incident, then we can say that this is truly over.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Bibeak! Look, Kroos is already asleep! How long have you been working today? You should take a break.
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Almost... one more length of cloth...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Just a little bit more...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Wow, you've already started cutting?
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: But didn't you already finish the clothes for your parents? What's this one for?
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Bibeak stops and gazes at the rough cut of the black jacket in front of her.
The threads are messy, the cloth prickly, the edges frayed.
She instinctively reaches for her scissors, wanting to cut it up.
This is...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I made this while thinking about the man in prison.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: You made a jacket for him?!
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Mm... what's going on?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: ...Wow.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: I'm amazed, Bibeak. Looks like you've really let it go.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: It's incredible that you're making clothes for someone who hurt you.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: I'd never be able to, not in a million years.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: The operator stands up and pats Bibeak on the shoulder.
If I were you, I'd have moved, left the place and never looked back. I wouldn't go and see the one who hurt me, and I certainly wouldn't make clothes for him.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: I would've hated him for the rest of my life. I'd never forgive him.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: I'd always thought you were strong and brave, but I've gained a whole new level of respect for you.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: You're amazing, really.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Bibeak opened her mouth to speak, but ended up simply smiling.
She lowers the hand holding the scissors and exhales.
Thanks... I don't know why I...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: It's nothing, Kalin. Thanks for the kind words.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: It's getting late. We should call it a day.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: See ya later, Bibeak!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hey, Kroos, do you know when she's leaving? I want to send her off.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Maybe have a little tea party before she goes.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Sounds like fun!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Bibeak's been helping me make clothes for Dad. I-If you need help setting the place up, I can do it!
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: All ready?
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Careful, eh? Cup could be hot!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Snacks, check. Ribbons, check. We're just waiting for Bibeak!
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Hey, guys! I brought her!
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Sorry everyone, packing took longer than expected.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Wait, my popper's stuck! Wait—
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Bang!
The operators around the table pull their poppers, sending confetti flying.
And there we go! Bibeak's send-off party!
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Want some tea, Bibeak?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Have a nice trip!
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: You always work so hard, making so many beautiful clothes for everyone, and staying on top of things in missions. Have a nice trip back home!
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Come on, isn't this a bit much?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I'm just visiting home for a few weeks...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Just sit back and enjoy yourself, girl. You're the guest of honor.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: We've worked together for a few years now, and you're like a sister to me.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: You may look soft and gentle on the outside, but whenever you put your mind to something, you get it done.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: It's all thanks to everyone's help... I couldn't have made it on my own.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Have some snacks! Fresh out of the kitchen.
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: The cafeteria staff also said they wanted to give you the best send-off they could.
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: C'mon, how 'bout we give our cups a little clink? Just don't let Fang see, or I'd never hear the end of it. 'You don't toast with teacups, blah blah blah.'
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: We're about the same age, but I'm nowhere near as brave as you are. You're a completely different person from when you first came to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: T-Thanks, everybody...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: What I admire the most is how you can bring yourself to make clothes for someone who hurt you.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: I could never.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: It's not really like that. I don't even know why I did it...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Maybe this trip will let you finally close the book on it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Guess this is what they mean when they say 'repay a bad deed with a good one'.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: 'Repay a bad deed with a good one'...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Have a safe trip, Bibeak!
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Er, yeah, thanks.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Thanks...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (They think I'm someone who repays a bad deed with a good one.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (They think that I'm a good person, a kind person.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (They like and respect me for that. They're holding a send-off party for someone like that.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (They admire how I'm making clothes for someone who hurt me.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (Mom and Dad always taught me to be dignified and well-mannered. So I should be happy for who I am now.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (Am I?)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (Is this the Bibeak I wanted to be?)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (Do I... like myself like this?)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Bibeak feels a burning sensation as she gazes upon the smiles on the everyone's faces.
Their laughter seems jarring, the lights blinding, the teacup scorching. She feels the urge to smash something.
Her hand trembles, and the cup falls to the ground, startling her with the noise.
No one saw clearly what had happened, only its aftermath, with broken pieces and tea spilled all over the ground.
Oh! What happened...?
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Are you okay, Bibeak?
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Gee, Bibeak, you're so excited to go home you can't even hold your cup?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: (It's not that...)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Well, as they say in Yan: Break a cup, break a trouble. Sounds like everything's gonna be great!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. This is your send-off party. You sit right there, and I'll go get you a new cup.
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Ah, watch out! Lemme clean this up first.
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: (Did I... just catch a glimpse of my true feelings?)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Bibeak...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I-It's nothing. I just lost my grip.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Let's keep going. I didn't spill anything on anyone, did I?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I'll clean it up. I see some broken pieces by my feet, and I have the best view of it.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Huh? You sure?
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Well, I'm just glad you're okay. That spooked me there.
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: I just lost my grip. It's fine.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (Now I understand. I don't like myself like this.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I... I really appreciate you all for holding this send-off for me. Some of you I've fought alongside, and some of you I've made clothes with.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: These past few years have been the best of my life.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (I really appreciate all of you, and your sincere best-wishes.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I'll tell my parents how great the friends I've made here are, such warm and kind people who held a going away party for me.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: (I've... made my decision. This time, I won't regret it.)
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Well, the ship hasn't stopped yet. Shall we continue?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Have a safe trip! Enjoy yourself!
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Bon voyage!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I packed you these snacks, in case you get hungry on the way!
attributes.name: Pinecone

attributes.content: Stay safe!
attributes.name: Idle Operator

attributes.content: Thank you, everyone! Bye!
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Yes, I made an application and was approved for a visit from 1500 to 1530 hours.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: May I see the confirmation letter?
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Looks like everything is in order. Follow me, please.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: There's just a little more paperwork to do.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: While we wait for the confirmation letter to be verified, I'll need you to read and acknowledge the prison visitation rules.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I'll also need you to fill in your legal name and information on this visitor's form.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Finally, please go over these safety rules while we get the prisoner ready. You'll be taken to the visiting room once everything is set up.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Finally.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Five minutes.
Ten minutes.
Twenty minutes.
The tea is now cold, and time seems to slow down during the wait for the jailer to return.
Everything's ready. Please sign the safety rules, and I'll take you to the visiting room.
attributes.name: Jailer

attributes.content: Alright, thank you.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: ...You're here, kind lady!
attributes.name: Prisoner

attributes.content: You read my letter, didn't you? You listened to me and decided to give yourself a chance for us to put the past to rest and find peace!
attributes.name: Prisoner

attributes.content: The doctor was right. I should forgive myself and let my issues go. I found peace, and so can you!
attributes.name: Prisoner

attributes.content: Thank you so much, kind lady!
attributes.name: Prisoner

attributes.content: Bibeak silently hands over a package.
Is this for me?
attributes.name: Prisoner

attributes.content: ...What's this? A letter... my letter to you? Why did you bring it back?
attributes.name: Prisoner

attributes.content: He extends his hands in excitement, trying to squeeze them through the window's gaps to touch Bibeak's trembling hands.
His gaze meets hers.
She opens her mouth and utters a single phrase.
Then she stands up, turns around, and leaves the visiting room.
She hears the sound of the prisoner banging on the glass, and sees the guards rush into the room. The sounds fade away until she no longer hears them, nor does she care to.
Bibeak heads through the long hallway and goes outside.
It is a beautiful day. She looks at the clear skies and exhales.
